TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PipeTransmissionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the transmission mode of the pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Anonymous pipes do not support the F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode.Message?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True transmission mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode Byte = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that data in the pipe is transmitted and read as a stream of bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode Message = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that data in the pipe is transmitted and read as a stream of messages.
